student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi! How are you? I heard you joined a cooking class. How is it going?
Hi! I'm good, thank you. Yes, I joined a cooking class. It's fun! I learn a lot.
That’s great! What kind of dishes are you learning to cook?
We learn pasta, salad, and soup.
Nice! Which one is your favorite so far?
That’s awesome! Pasta is always a good choice. Do you think you’ll try cooking it at home soon?
Yes, I will try at home. I hope it turns out good!
Good job! You have completed the task. I’m sure your pasta will turn out great. Talk to you later!
